# Setup

```{r setup, include=TRUE}
library(tidyverse)
library(httr)
library(readxl)
library(zoo)
library(magrittr)
library(viridis)
#library(lubridate)
#library(RColorBrewer)
```

```{r map.theme, include=TRUE}
map.theme <- theme(text = element_text(color = "#FFFFFF"), 
                   panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#444444"),
                   plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#444444"),
                   panel.grid = element_blank(),
                   plot.title = element_text(size = 50),
                   plot.subtitle = element_text(size = 25),
                   plot.caption = element_text(size = 20), 
                   axis.text = element_blank(),
                   axis.title = element_blank(),
                   axis.ticks = element_blank(),
                   legend.position = "bottom", 
                   legend.key.size = unit(1, "cm"),
                   legend.background = element_rect(fill="#444444"),
                   legend.title = element_blank())
```

```{r read_data, include=TRUE}
df <- read.csv("https://query.data.world/s/qss24rzobvbkg6gc7y7lzfn75c4b46",
               header=TRUE, stringsAsFactors=FALSE)
```

```{r glimpse, include=TRUE}
df %>% 
  glimpse()
```

```{r summary, include=TRUE}
df %>% 
  summary()
```
